title: Welcome to the ICE Conference 2011

author: Volker Stich, FIR - Research Institute for Operations Management, RWTH Aachen University

segmentation: Ladies and gentlemen, I just got the sign from the organizing committee.
It's 5 past nine.
That's enough for waiting for those who didn't come on time.
But it's an honor for those who come on time.
I thank you very much that all of you who have already arrived here now and took the time to arrive here.
I know from preceding discussions from yesterday and from Saturday that you are coming from far, far abroad.
From Mexico, even for Mexico.
